Traits.Name: Eyeless
Traits.Description: Blinded permanently, but can still target foes normally.

Traits.Name: Decree
Traits.Description:
At the start of the round, the Broker makes one of the following decrees, making a different decree each round than the last one. Foes that do not follow the decree by the end of the round take 2[D] damage as an effect and are blinded. Blinded characters are stunned.
- Decree of Anger: Attack this round.
- Decree of Selfishness: Do not use abilities that target allies this round.
- Decree of Paranoia: End turn without being adjacent to any other characters.
- Decree of Rashness: End turn adjacent to a foe.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Enfeeble
Actions.Hit: [D]+[fray] and character must save or be pacified.

Actions.Name: World Revolving
Actions.Description: Shove all foes on the battlefield 1 space in the same direction.
Actions.Collide: Foe takes fray damage and is branded.

Actions.Name: Balance Scales
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 must save or take Divine damage equal to 25% of their hp, or 1 damage on a successful save. An ally in range 6 gains vigor 1.
